sentences.english: From in this example in Leaning Tower of Pisa , I learned a lot of.
sentences.chinese: 从比萨斜塔这个例子中，我学到了很多。

sentences.english: Unlike the tower in Pisa, the Capital Gate building has been deliberately engineered to slant.
sentences.chinese: 和比萨斜塔不同，这座塔的倾斜是刻意建造而成。

sentences.english: Both because of its inclination and its beauty, the Tower has been the object of very special attention.
sentences.chinese: 由于倾斜和独特的美，比萨斜塔吸引了世人的眼光。

sentences.english: In Pisa , I see the Leaning Tower of Pisa.
sentences.chinese: 可是比萨斜塔为什么会倾斜呢？

sentences.english: The Tower of Pisa is the bell tower of that city's cathedral in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 比萨斜塔位于意大利，是大教堂的钟楼。

sentences.english: How far does it lean? Nearly five times farther than the Leaning Tower of Pisa in Italy。
sentences.chinese: 其倾斜度几乎是意大利比萨斜塔倾斜度的5倍。

sentences.english: Why does the Leaning Tower of Piza in lean?
sentences.chinese: 意大利的比萨斜塔为什么会倾斜呢？

definition: bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
places of historic interest/historical sites/CL:個|个[ge4]

Zhaozhou Bridge over Xiao River 洨河[Xiao2 He2] in Zhao county 趙縣|赵县[Zhao4 Xian4], Shijiazhuang, Hebei, dating back to the Sui dynasty 隋代[Sui2 dai4] (581-617) and the world's oldest extant stone arch bridge
